name: Pixel Brush - Pixel art creator
description: Draw in the pixel art style, improve your skills and share your creations! Use the canvas to create video game sprites, images and more.  Why use Pixel Brush?   Art is auto-saved for peace of mind  Relax with the intuitive interface on phones and tablets  Use any color with customizable palettes  Pixel perfect strokes for lines and shapes  Easily work on pixels with the convenient auto-thumbnail  Share drawings in high quality  Features coming next   Animation  Pixel Brush for non-Android devices!  Follow Pixel Brush on Instagram: https://instagram.com/_u/pixelbrush.app Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pixelbrush_app
